entries.source:
Chat Edit: './scripts/fix-ssl.sh
╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║         SSL Certificate Fix for Traefik & mkcert          ║
╚════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

[i] Checking if mkcert is installed...
[✓] mkcert is installed
[i] Version: v1.4.4
[i] Checking if mkcert root CA is installed...
[✓] mkcert root CA is installed
[i] mkcert CAROOT: /home/admin/.local/share/mkcert
[i] Checking certificate directory...
[✓] Certificate directory ready: ./docker/traefik/certs
[i] Backing up existing certificates...
[✓] Backup created: ./docker/traefik/certs/backup-20251221-235508
[i] Generating new SSL certificate...
[i] Domains: admin.dccp.test portal.dccp.test *.dccp.test minio.local.test minio-console.local.test mailpit.local.test local.test *.local.test
[i] Running: mkcert -key-file dccp.test-key.pem -cert-file dccp.test.pem  "admin.dccp.test" "portal.dccp.test" "*.dccp.test" "minio.local.test" "minio-console.local.test" "mailpit.local.test" "local.test" "*.local.test"
ERROR: "\"admin.dccp.test\"" is not a valid hostname, IP, URL or email
[✗] Failed to generate certificate'
